statements: SELECT * FROM zoning_regulations;
SELECT regulation_name, regulation_description FROM zoning_regulations WHERE permit_required = TRUE;
SELECT regulation_name, regulation_category FROM zoning_regulations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM zoning_regulations WHERE regulation_category = 'Environmental';
SELECT id, regulation_name FROM zoning_regulations ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM zoning_regulations WHERE permit_required = TRUE;
SELECT regulation_name, regulation_category FROM zoning_regulations ORDER BY regulation_category ASC;
SELECT id, regulation_name, regulation_description FROM zoning_regulations WHERE regulation_category = 'Residential' LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, regulation_name, regulation_category FROM zoning_regulations WHERE regulation_description LIKE '%building%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, regulation_name, permit_required FROM zoning_regulations WHERE regulation_category = 'Commercial' AND permit_required = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM zoning_regulations;
SELECT regulation_name, regulation_description FROM zoning_regulations;
SELECT * FROM land_use_permits;
SELECT permit_name, permit_issued_date FROM land_use_permits;
SELECT permit_id, permit_name, permit_issued_date FROM land_use_permits;
SELECT regulation_name, regulation_description FROM zoning_regulations WHERE regulation_id = 1;
SELECT permit_name, permit_issued_date FROM land_use_permits WHERE permit_id = 2;
SELECT regulation_name, regulation_description FROM zoning_regulations ORDER BY regulation_name DESC;
SELECT permit_name, permit_description FROM land_use_permits WHERE permit_issued_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY permit_issued_date ASC;
SELECT regulation_id, regulation_name, regulation_description FROM zoning_regulations WHERE regulation_name LIKE '%building%' ORDER BY regulation_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM zoning_regulations;
SELECT regulation_name, description FROM zoning_regulations;
SELECT id, regulation_name, effective_date FROM zoning_regulations ORDER BY effective_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM land_use_permits WHERE property_address = '123 Main Street';
SELECT application_id, applicant_name, status FROM permit_applications WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT * FROM zoning_regulations;
SELECT regulation_name, description FROM zoning_regulations WHERE effective_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM land_use_permits WHERE property_address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT applicant_name, application_date FROM permit_applications WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY application_date DESC;
SELECT permit_type, COUNT(*) AS permit_count FROM permit_applications GROUP BY permit_type HAVING permit_count > 1 ORDER BY permit_count DESC;
SELECT regulation_id, regulation_description, regulation_category, regulation_date FROM zoning_regulations;
SELECT regulation_category, regulation_id, regulation_description, regulation_date FROM zoning_regulations;
SELECT * FROM zoning_regulations WHERE regulation_id = 1;
SELECT regulation_category, regulation_description FROM zoning_regulations WHERE regulation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT regulation_description FROM zoning_regulations WHERE regulation_category = 'Building';
SELECT * FROM zoning_regulations ORDER BY regulation_date DESC, regulation_id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT regulation_id, regulation_description FROM zoning_regulations WHERE regulation_category = 'Environmental'
SELECT regulation_id, regulation_description, regulation_date FROM zoning_regulations WHERE regulation_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY regulation_date DESC
SELECT regulation_id, regulation_description, regulation_category FROM zoning_regulations WHERE regulation_category IN ('Health', 'Safety')
SELECT AVG(regulation_id) AS avg_regulation_id, MAX(regulation_date) AS max_regulation_date FROM zoning_regulations
SELECT * FROM zoning_regulations;
SELECT id, regulation_name FROM zoning_regulations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM permit_applications WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT applicant_name, permit_type, application_date FROM permit_applications WHERE application_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT category_name, description FROM zoning_categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM zoning_regulations;
SELECT regulation_name, regulation_description FROM zoning_regulations ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM permit_applications WHERE status = 'pending' ORDER BY application_date;
SELECT applicant_name, permit_type, application_date FROM permit_applications WHERE status = 'approved' ORDER BY application_date DESC;
SELECT ph.history_id, ph.action, ph.action_date, p.permit_type FROM permit_history ph JOIN land_use_permits p ON ph.permit_id = p.permit_id ORDER BY ph.action_date DESC;
